name: Wretched Retribution
description: As a prisoner of war, you have been held against your own will to pass through perilous dungeons, for the entertainment of your adversaries. There are many trials you must complete in your journey to the end of the dungeon. Whether it is using acrobatics to traverse the dungeon, gathering artefacts to open passageways or defending yourself from the cybernetic droids who come to seek and destroy. Death is lurking around every corner. Will you die as a prisoner, or will you live to see another day, longing to be rescued by your comrades.
